title.rendered: Tiffany Brown FW22. Paris Fashion Week

content.rendered:
Tiffany Brown FW22


PARIS WOMENSWEAR WEEK FALL-WINTER 2022


For her third fashion show in Paris, Tiffany Brown realized a collection celebrating women. The theme, Brown, is declined in many shades of brown.

Fabrics : vegan leather and fake fur are put in value for this new collection

Tiffany Brown is about to open two stores during the year : one in Soho for summer 2022 and Paris in fall 2022 !



By Fashion-editor : Christina V Henningstad  Production: Fashionview.eu
